class HierarchicalReconciliation[source]

HierarchicalReconciliation(reconcilers:List[typing.Callable])

Type Default Details
reconcilers typing.List[typing.Callable] Reconciliation classes of the methods module
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HierarchicalReconciliation.reconcile[source]

HierarchicalReconciliation.reconcile(Y_h:DataFrame, Y_df:DataFrame, S:DataFrame, tags:Dict[str, ndarray])

Type Default Details
Y_h DataFrame Base forecasts with columns ds and models to reconcile indexed by unique_id.
Y_df DataFrame Training set of base time series with columns ['ds', 'y'] indexed by unique_id
S DataFrame Summing matrix of size (base, bottom).
tags typing.Dict[str, numpy.ndarray] Each key is a level and its value contains tags associated to that level.
{% endraw %}
